ValidationRule.description: When "One Time Event" Billing Frequency is selected, Contract Term can only be a value of 1.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", CONTAINS(Opportunity.RecordType.Name, "PGi"), ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c, 'One Time Event'), Contract_Term__c != 1, $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Contract Term can only be a value of 1 when One Time Event is selected as the Billing Frequency.
